author: Travis Fedschun
title: Hong Kong coronavirus battle includes banning all tourist arrivals, halting alcohol sales at bars, restaurants
description: All tourist arrivals to the global financial center of Hong Kong will be banned from entering for two weeks amid a spike of imported cases of coronavirus as officials took other steps Monday to contain the spread of the virus.
content:
All tourist arrivals to the global financial center of Hong Kong will be banned from entering for two weeks amid a spike of imported cases of coronavirus as officials took additional steps Monday to contain the spread of the virus.
